input.sentences: today was recognition day for our organization group
officer dudas was handed a certification for civilian service .
he was also given pins for bravery .
officer williams was all smiles when receiving her certification .
at the end of the ceremony | we discussed the group 's achievements | and we were given a final round of applause .
output.sentences: Today I was recognized by my organization as an honorable member.
My officer thanked me for my service and handed me my honorable award.
My officer got pins for his great bravery!
Another member, a girl, had her father Williams present and he was very proud.
In the final part of the awards program there was a discussion of the great things that we all did.
